name: google-ads-nodejs
description: Query Google Ads data using GAQL with OAuth 2.0 authentication. Provides read-only access to campaigns, keywords, search terms, and account data.
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server for Google Ads analytics and reporting. Execute Google Ads Query Language (GAQL) queries for campaign performance, keyword analysis, search term reports, and cross-account data access. Features OAuth 2.0 authentication, read-only safety enforcement, and optimized response handling for large datasets.

tools.name: run_google_ads_gaql
tools.description: Execute a Google Ads Query Language (GAQL) query for data retrieval. Supports all GAQL resources including campaigns, ad groups, keywords, search terms, and metrics. Read-only - mutations are blocked for safety.

tools.name: google_ads_list_accounts
tools.description: List all Google Ads accounts accessible under the configured MCC (Manager) account. Returns account IDs, names, currencies, timezones, and status information.

developer_token.description: Google Ads API Developer Token from your Google Ads Manager account

login_customer_id.description: MCC (Manager) Account ID - 10 digits without dashes (e.g., 1234567890)

client_id.description: OAuth 2.0 Client ID from Google Cloud Console

client_secret.description: OAuth 2.0 Client Secret from Google Cloud Console

refresh_token.description: OAuth 2.0 Refresh Token obtained through the authorization flow
